text: Tractor Sports Club (), commonly known as Tractor is an Iranian football club. It is based in Tabriz, East Azarbaijan. They play in the Persian Gulf Pro League. They used to be known as Tractor Sazi. ==Rivalries== They are rivals of 3 Iranian teams, being Esteghlal F.C., Persepolis F.C., and Machine Sazi F.C.. ==Honours== ===Official titles=== * Iran Pro League : Runner up (3): 2011–12, 2012–13, 2014–15 : Third Place (2): 2016–17, 1992–93 * Hazfi Cup : Winner (2): 2013–14, 2019–20 : Runner up (3): 1975–76, 1994–95, 2016–17 * Azadegan League (2nd Tier) : Winner (1): 2008–09 * 2nd Division : Winner (1): 1974–75 : Runner up (2): 1976–77, 1995–96 * East Azerbaijan Super Cup : Winner (1): 1992 * Tabriz Football League : Winner (1): 1984–85 * Tabriz Football League's 2nd Division : Winner (1): 1981–82 ==References== Category:1970s establishments in Iran Category:1970 establishments in Asia Category:Iranian football clubs Category:East Azarbaijan Province
title: Tractor S.C.
